entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
